name: Drop Dial
description:
Control a rotating, music-powered bar in a low-saturation cityscape. Rotate the bar to hit the notes as they come down in time with the music. Score and combo are indicated by the look of buildings around you, as well as numerically. The city grows brighter as you do better. 

Controls:

Left or A - Rotate the bar counter-clockwise

Right or D- Rotate the bar clockwise

Space - Select (on menu screens)

Final project for UC Berkeley's Game Design DeCal, Spring 2018. 

Gameplay design and development: Ryan El Khoury, Jamie You

Game VFX: Alex Chan, Ryan El Khoury, Junseok Yoo

Music used:

Blank Banshee - B:/ Start Up

Vaperror - ://transmission
